nodes.text: The Star Wars Planets Collection is a supplement for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game published by West End Games in October 1994. This sourcebook compiles the Planets of the Galaxy Volume One, Two, and Three and updates them for second edition rules.
Explore a galaxy of a thousand-thousand worlds—adventure awaits!

Hurtling through the darkness of the void are the planets of the Star Wars Galaxy. While the Galactic Civil War rages on, there are new worlds to explore, profits to be made, allies to be discovered and enemies to be defeated.

Within this book are two dozen worlds waiting to be incorporated into Star Wars adventures. From the dangerous trader port of Celanon, to the mining center of Gacerian and the criminal haven of Korbin, this supplement has something to offer every Star Wars campaign.
